types.html:
ressac m (plural ressacs)

  1. swash, backwash
    • 2001, Erik Orsenna, chapter XIII, in La grammaire est une chanson douce, Stock:
      Bien sûr, je n'entendais rien. Rien que le grondement sourd du ressac, là-bas, derrière la colline.
      I certainly didn't hear anything. Nothing but the muffled rumble of the backwash, down behind the hill.
      (please add an English translation of this quotation)

title: ressac
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ʁə.sak/
